EmailTemplate.name: Supplier completed digital registration
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Entity_CP__c.Name}, has completed the supplier digital registration.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Entity_CP__c.CreatedBy},
You're receiving this notification because, {!Entity_CP__c.Name}, completed the digital registration. The person who completed the process was, {!Entity_CP__c.Registration_Contact_First_Name__c} {!Entity_CP__c.Registration_Contact_Last_Name__c}.
You can see the complete digital response by clicking here.
The next step is to ensure proper registration, you can correct any inconsistency directly in the record, for further Sourcing template automatic generation in the SupplierToGo button.
To review the Entity record created in Salesforce, click here.
Regards,
Digital Marketing - Engenium Capital
